verses.text: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* steal \w an|strong="H5221"\w* ox \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* sheep, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* sell \w it|strong="H0518"\w*: \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* restore five oxen \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* ox, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* four sheep \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* sheep.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* thief \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w found|strong="H0369"\w* breaking open \w a|strong="H0518"\w* house \w or|strong="H0518"\w* undermining \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* wounded \w so|strong="H0369"\w* \w as|strong="H4376"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* die: \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H0518"\w* slew \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* did \w this|strong="H0518"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* sun \w is|strong="H3027"\w* risen, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* hath committed murder, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* die. \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* wherewith \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w theft|strong="H1591"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* sold.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* which \w he|strong="H3588"\w* stole \w be|strong="H0376"\w* found \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, alive, \w either|strong="H3588"\w* ox, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* ass, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* sheep: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* restore double.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H0398"\w* \w man|strong="H0784"\w* hurt \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* vineyard, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* beast \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* \w upon|strong="H0784"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H0784"\w* \w is|strong="H0176"\w* other men’s: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1200"\w* restore \w the|strong="H0853"\w* best \w of|strong="H7704"\w* whatsoever \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w in|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* own \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w in|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* vineyard, according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* estimation \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* damage.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* fire breaking \w out|strong="H0413"\w* light \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* thorns, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* catch stacks \w of|strong="H1004"\w* corn, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* corn standing \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fields, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* kindled \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* good \w the|strong="H3588"\w* loss.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* \w deliver|strong="H7971"\w* money, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w any|strong="H4399"\w* vessel unto \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w keep|strong="H7126"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* stolen \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* received \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* restore double:

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* thief \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* known, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w master|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w swear|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* lay \w his|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour’s goods,

\w To|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H8104"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* fraud, \w either|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* ass, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* raiment, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* damage: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w parties|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gods: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* judgment, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* restore double \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* \w deliver|strong="H7971"\w* ass, ox, sheep, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* beast, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* neighbour’s \w custody|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* die, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* hurt, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* saw \w it|strong="H0518"\w*:

There \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* be \w an|strong="H1589"\w* oath \w between|strong="H5973"\w* them, \w that|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* did \w not|strong="H0518"\w* put forth \w his|strong="H0518"\w* hand \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* neighbour’s goods: \w and|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* accept \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* oath; \w and|strong="H5973"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* be compelled \w to|strong="H5973"\w* make \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* were taken \w away|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* stealth, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* make \w the|strong="H0935"\w* loss good \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* owner.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* eaten \w by|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* beast, let \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w bring|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* which \w was|strong="H0369"\w* slain, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H7916"\w* borrow \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* neighbour \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w* \w things|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* hurt \w or|strong="H0518"\w* die, \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* being \w present|strong="H0935"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* obliged \w to|strong="H0935"\w* make \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* owner \w be|strong="H3808"\w* present, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* restitution, especially \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* hired \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H0376"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hire \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* work.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* man seduce \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w yet|strong="H5414"\w* espoused, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* lie \w with|strong="H0001"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*: \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* endow \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* wife.

If \w the|strong="H3808"\w* maid’s father \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* give her \w to|strong="H3808"\w* him, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* give money according \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* dowry, which virgins \w are|strong="H3808"\w* wont \w to|strong="H3808"\w* receive.
Wizards thou shalt not suffer \w to|strong="H4191"\w* live.
Whosoever copulateth \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H2076"\w* beast \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* put \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* sacrificeth \w to|strong="H1961"\w* gods, \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* put \w to|strong="H1961"\w* death, save only \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* molest \w a|strong="H3808"\w* stranger, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w* also were strangers \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt.
\w You|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w hurt|strong="H6031"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* widow \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* orphan.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* hurt \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H0639"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* cry \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* hear \w their|strong="H1961"\w* cry:

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* rage \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* enkindled, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* strike \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wives \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w widows|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* children fatherless.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou lend money \w to|strong="H0935"\w* any \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H0935"\w* poor, \w that|strong="H5704"\w* dwelleth \w with|strong="H0935"\w* thee, thou shalt \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* hard \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* extortioner, \w nor|strong="H0518"\w* oppress \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* usuries.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0905"\w* thy neighbour \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w garment|strong="H8071"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* pledge, thou shalt \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w again|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* sunset.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* same \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* only \w thing|strong="H7043"\w* wherewith \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* covered, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* clothing \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H7043"\w* body, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* other \w to|strong="H0430"\w* sleep \w in|strong="H0430"\w*: \w if|strong="H7043"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* cry \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* hear \w him|strong="H0430"\w*, because \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H0430"\w* compassionate.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* speak ill \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* gods, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* prince \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w people|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* curse.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H1961"\w* delay \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* thy tithes \w and|strong="H3117"\w* thy firstfruits: thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy sons \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

Thou shalt do \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thy oxen \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* sheep: seven days \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* dam, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* eighth day thou shalt \w give|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H7993"\w*.
You shall be holy men to me: the flesh that beasts have tasted of before, you shall not eat, but shall cast it to the dogs.
